attributes.action: ban the Islamic extremist group, Islam4UK, from operating in th UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Among its founders are the militant preacher Omar Bakri Mohammed – who is living in exile in Lebanon – and former solicitor Anjem Choudary, who both played a part in Al-Muhajiroun. The group Al-Muhajiroun was banned under the British Terrorism Act 2006. However, Islam4UK soon sprang up in its place and offers Bakri a platform to deliver his lectures over the internet.

rejection.details: The group has today been banned.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
